name: Pursuit (BluishGreenPro)
description:
Watch me make new levels on Twitch! (Mon - Friday, 7:30 PM - 9:30 PM [GMT-4])

Join the BGP Discord!

Download the EXE for:

  • Fullscreen (Toggle Fullscreen: F4)
  • Improved graphics: Everything gets a nice drop-shadow
  • Better Performance:  No lag on death

When nothing feels like it's working, what keeps you going? A linear platformer with a minimal "story". Play solo, or have a 2nd player join in as the Butterfly to lend a helping hand! (Summon the butterfly with Right-click).

Made for GMC Jam #41. Art + Engine built ahead of time. Made in 16 hours for Jam.

Music:

Music by Mark Sparling from the Album "Daily Songs Vol. 33 (March 2019)", used with permission. Tracks Used (In order of occurrence):

  • Daily March 7 2019 #964 (LSDJ) | Mark Sparling
  • Daily March 24 2019 #981 (LSDJ) | Mark Sparling
Controls:
  • Move: WASD / Arrow Keys / Left Joystick
  • Jump: Space / Gamepad-South
  • Pause: Escape / Start 
    • Adjust Music / SFX Volume from the Pause Menu
  • Restart: R / Select (Back) (Restarts at most recent check-point)
  • Toggle Fullscreen: F4 (Desktop EXE only)
  • Summon support Butterfly: Right-Click
    • Butterfly Bubble: Left-Click (Creates a bubble  which freezes enemies / fire)
  • Supports Gamepad!
    • You can set Gamepad to Ignore from the Start Menu
Change Log:
  • v1.1:
    • Controls now respond to BOTH Keyboard / Gamepad unless Gamepad is specifically set to Ignore
    • Fixed issue in HTML5 with Support Butterfly
  • v0.1.2:
    • Improved lag on death
    • Hid initial spawn point
    • Added SFX for water and Craniums

Check out "Worlds Within Worlds" - a level-based game made in the same engine!
